entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
